title: [Health] Daytime eating may benefit mental health: team found that, among participants in the daytime and nighttime eating group, depression-like mood levels increased by 26% and anxiety-like mood levels by 16%. Participants in the daytime-only eating group did not experience this increase
[Health] Acute sleep loss increases CNS health biomarkers and compromises the ability to stay awake in a sex-and weight-specific manner - Translational Psychiatry
